SHERRY

Sherry is a blended wine from the district of Jerez de la Frontera,
in Southern Spain, a district of chalky, white soil and abundant sunshine.
The newly pressed juice is fermented in large vats and it is only after

fermentation is complete that spirit is added.

LA INA Pedro Domecq

TIO PEPE Gonzales y Byass

ROYAL AMONTILLADO Pale Dry Gonzales y Byass
DRY AMONTILLADO Pedro Domecq

APITIV Extra Dry Sandeman’s

DRY SACK William’s & Humbert

DRY CLUB Duff Gordon

CHOICEST FULL PALE CREAM Palomino

BRISTOL CREAM Harvey's

PORT

Sandeman’s ‘‘Partners”’
Cockburns’ No. 25

Harvey's Hunting, Fine Old Tawny
Feverheerds’ Commendador
Christian Brothers, Tawny Port
